label:label.xlink:title: [T04.01] suma C0305(que cumplan: C0020 = "r0380 - Other MREL eligible liabilities" and C0160 valor reportado - 31/12/2022 tiene que estar entre >=2y))) + [T06.01] suma C0205(que cumplan: C0020 = "r0370 - Subordinated liabilities (not recognised as own funds)" and C0140 valor reportado - 31/12/2022 tiene que estar entre >=2y)) = [M04.00] r0820/c0010
